item.title: 特斯拉中国出货量再次下降，有望实现季度丰收
item.description: 尽管中国政府增加了旨在吸引更多消费者购买电动汽车的补贴，但特斯拉公司上海工厂 11 月份的交付量仍连续第二个月下降。【原文：Deliveries from Tesla Inc.’s Shanghai factory fell for a second month in November, despite an increase in subsidies from the Chinese government aimed at enticing more consumers to buy an electric car.】

item.title: 法国股市在动荡中创下 31 年来的最大跌幅
item.description: 法国 CAC 40 指数跑输德国股票基准指数的幅度是三十年来最大的，巴黎的政治动荡预示着该指数将进一步下跌。【原文：France’s CAC 40 Index is underperforming Germany’s stock benchmark by the most in three decades, and political turmoil in Paris is pointing to further declines.】

item.title: 据说道达尔即将以 20 亿欧元收购可再生能源开发商 VSB
item.description: 据知情人士透露，道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）即将从私募股权公司 Partners Group Holding AG 手中收购 VSB 集团，该交易对这家可再生能源项目开发商的估值约为 20 亿欧元（21 亿美元）。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is close to acquiring VSB Group from private equity firm Partners Group Holding AG, in a deal that values the renewable project developer at about €2 billion ($2.1 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特寻求食品自给自足，乳制品公司计划实现增长
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯最大的乳制品生产商正涉足海产品和红肉，以满足日益增长的需求，这凸显了该国在粮食方面实现更大程度自给自足的雄心。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s largest dairy producer is venturing into seafood and red meat amid greater demand, underscoring the country ambitions for greater food self-reliance.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡官员表示，阿达尼支持的斯里兰卡港口工程仍在继续
item.description: 一位当地高级官员表示，由阿达尼集团牵头的斯里兰卡港口扩建工程正在如期进行，尽管在该印度企业集团的高管在美国被起诉后，美国为该项目提供的 5.53 亿美元资金的命运仍不明朗。【原文：Work on a Sri Lankan port’s expansion led by the Adani Group is progressing as scheduled, a top local official said, even as the fate of $553 million in American funding for the project remains uncertain following the indictment of the Indian conglomerate’s executives in the US.】

item.title: 南非 Transnet 仍未实现 2024 年煤炭铁路目标
item.description: 据埃克萨罗资源有限公司（Exxaro Resources Ltd.）称，南非 Transnet SOC 有限公司仍未实现将内陆煤矿的煤炭运往沿海地区出口的目标，尽管运量已有所改善。【原文：South Africa’s Transnet SOC Ltd. remains short of a target to ship coal from inland mines to the coast for export, though volumes have improved, according to Exxaro Resources Ltd.】

item.title: 日本低利率地区的 "异常 "优惠利息交易被取消了
item.description: 一家日本电子产品零售商在推出一项慷慨的现金返还计划后，因申请过多而被迫取消。【原文：A Japanese electronics retailer was forced to cancel a generous cashback program on launch day after it was overwhelmed with applications.】

item.title: 中国以牙还牙，禁止向美国出口锗和镓
item.description: 在乔-拜登总统的政府升级对北京的芯片限制后，中国宣布将加强控制，防止向美国出口具有军事用途的材料，以牙还牙。【原文：China announced it will ramp up controls preventing materials being exported to the US that have military uses, in a tit-for-tat move after President Joe Biden’s government escalated chip curbs on Beijing.】

item.title: 德勤称澳大利亚 Cbus 缺乏适当的开支程序
item.description: 根据德勤公司（Deloitte）的一项独立审查，澳大利亚最大的养老基金之一 Cbus Super 缺乏适当的程序，无法确保关键的支出决策符合其成员的最佳财务利益。【原文：Cbus Super, one of Australia’s largest pension funds, lacked proper procedures to ensure key expenses decisions were made in the best financial interests of its members, according to an independent review by Deloitte.】

item.title: 腾讯《流放之路 2》荣登主要市场 PC 游戏排行榜榜首
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）将于本周五发布一款新游戏《流放之路 2》（Path of Exile 2）。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. has a potential new hit on its hands with Path of Exile 2, a game set to release on Friday.】

item.title: 莱坊称 2025 年迪拜房价将再次飙升
item.description: 莱坊公司表示，迪拜房价在2024年已经飙升20%之后，明年可能会进一步攀升，这标志着大流行病后开始的有增无减的复苏势头将得到延续。【原文：Dubai home prices are likely to climb further next year after already surging 20% in 2024, marking an extension of the unabated recovery that started after the pandemic, Knight Frank said.】

item.title: 苏黎世希望在 AIG 交易后进一步加强健康和旅游部门
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团（Zurich Insurance Group AG）继斥资 6 亿美元完成对美国国际集团（American International Group）旗下 Travel Guard 公司的收购后，正在寻求收购一些公司，以进一步推动其不断增长的零售健康、旅游和福利业务。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG is looking to buy companies to further boost its growing retail health, travel and wellbeing business, following the completion of the $600 million purchase of American International Group’s Travel Guard unit.】

item.title: 韩国股市吸引 8 月以来最大单日外资流入
item.description: 由于强劲的美国经济数据预示着这个出口导向型国家的增长前景良好，韩国的股票基准吸引了三个多月来最大的外资流入。【原文：South Korea’s stock benchmark attracted its biggest foreign inflow in more than three months as strong US economic data bode well for growth in the export-oriented country.】

item.title: 国内生产总值意外放缓，卢比看跌期权押注飙升 200
item.description: 在数据显示印度经济增长急剧放缓后，期权交易商加大了对印度卢比的看跌押注，这给近几日连创新低的印度卢比带来了进一步的压力。【原文：Options traders have increased bearish wagers on the Indian rupee after data showed a sharp slowdown in the nation’s economic growth, heaping further pressure on the currency that’s hit a series of record lows in recent days.】

item.title: 英国统计学家警告称新劳动力市场数据将再次推迟发布
item.description: 英国统计机构警告说，其转用新的劳动力市场调查的工作将再次推迟，这一挫折可能会加深英国央行对就业数据准确性的担忧。【原文：The UK statistics agency warned of a fresh delay to its switch to a new labor market survey, a setback that is likely to deepen concerns at the Bank of England over the accuracy of the jobs data.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率上升，官方考虑下一次降息
item.description: 瑞士通胀率在连续三个月回落后略有加快，为瑞士国家银行下周降息提供了依据。【原文：Swiss inflation accelerated slightly after retreating for three months, sustaining the case for a Swiss National Bank interest-rate cut next week.】

item.title: 印度从俄罗斯转向美国购买尖端武器
item.description: 印度官员说，印度已经大幅减少了与俄罗斯的国防设备订单，现在正更多地从西方供应商那里购买，这对于一个传统上依赖莫斯科武器的国家来说是一个重大的政策转变。【原文：India has sharply reduced orders for defense equipment with Russia and is now buying more from Western suppliers, officials said, a significant policy shift for a nation traditionally reliant on arms from Moscow.】

item.title: 土耳其 11 月通胀放缓幅度低于预期
item.description: 土耳其上个月的消费价格增长速度高于预期，从而削弱了土耳其央行最早可能在 12 月开始降息的预期。【原文：Turkey’s consumer prices increased at a higher pace than anticipated last month, trimming expectations that the central bank might begin cutting interest rates as early as December.】

item.title: 尼日利亚自 2022 年以来首次发行欧洲债券，募集资金 22 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚自 2022 年 2 月以来首次出售欧元债券，筹集了 22 亿美元，吸引了超过发售额四倍的需求。【原文：Nigeria raised $2.2 billion with its first eurobond sale since February 2022, attracting demand for more than four times the amount on offer.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望走高，英镑下跌
法国的寒冷尚未蔓延到欧洲其他国家
item.description:
对马克龙和巴尼耶来说，推力已经到了无法控制的地步，但 PIIGS 还能挺得住。【原文：

Push is coming to ungovernable shove for Macron and Barnier, but the PIIGS are holding up just fine.

】

item.title: 中国领导人计划下周讨论 GDP 目标和经济刺激政策
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最高领导人计划于下周三开始召开一年一度的闭门中央经济工作会议，制定2025年的经济目标和刺激计划。【原文：China’s top leaders plan to start the annual closed-door Central Economic Work Conference next Wednesday to map out economic targets and stimulus plans for 2025, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国内生产总值（GDP）不达预期后，对印度央行行长未来的猜测升温
item.description: 印度近来最糟糕的一次国内生产总值（GDP）增长失误突然给央行行长沙克提坎塔-达斯（Shaktikanta Das）增加了更大的压力，尽管他的任期将于下周到期，但他仍未获得延期。【原文：One of India’s worst GDP growth misses in recent memory is suddenly adding more pressure on central bank Governor Shaktikanta Das, who still hasn’t gotten an extension even though his term expires next week.】

item.title: 纽约大学的达莫达兰说："购买'华丽七重奏'中的惩教内容吧
item.description: 纽约大学一位以擅长估值而闻名的教授表示，"华丽七股 "是在经济调整期间的买点，因为它们中的大多数都能持续赚钱。【原文：The “Magnificent Seven” stocks are a buy during corrections as most of them will keep generating money, according to a New York University professor known for his expertise on valuations.】

item.title: 阿托斯集团在推出欧盟生物识别边境系统时遭遇挫折
item.description:
财政和技术问题加剧了人们对该集团能否改革其边境管理方式的担忧

【原文：

Financial and technical problems are fueling concern about whether the bloc can revamp its approach to borders

】

item.title: 人类生殖规则即将改变
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列《后人类》的这一集中，我们将探讨 IVG 如何改变物种繁衍的方式。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Posthuman, we investigate how IVG has the ability to transform the way a species reproduces.

】

item.title: 英国金融体系有多稳定？
item.description:
在本期《In the City》节目中，英格兰银行的纳特-本杰明（Nat Benjamin）将讨论最新金融稳定报告的结果。【原文：

On this episode of In the City, the Bank of England’s Nat Benjamin discusses results from the latest financial stability report.

】

item.title: 泰国央行誓言采取 "稳健 "政策应对不确定性
item.description: 泰国央行行长塞萨布-素提瓦特那鲁普（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）表示，泰国央行将奉行 "稳健 "的货币政策，以有效应对明年全球经济面临的高度不确定性和意外后果。【原文：Thailand’s central bank will pursue a “robust” monetary policy that can effectively cope with high uncertainties and unintended consequences facing the global economy next year, according to Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput.】

item.title: 许多中国铜贸易商因担心关税而停止进口美国废铜
item.description: 据北京安泰科信息发展有限公司（Beijing Antaike Information Development Co.【原文：Many Chinese metal importers have stopped buying US copper scrap in anticipation of tariffs when Donald Trump assumes the presidency, according to Beijing Antaike Information Development Co.】

item.title: 马科斯否认菲律宾弹劾杜特尔特案
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）一直与副总统萨拉-杜特尔特（Sara Duterte）不和，尽管萨拉-杜特尔特明显威胁要杀死他，但小费迪南德-马科斯放弃了弹劾副总统的努力。【原文：Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr., who has been locked in a feud with Vice President Sara Duterte, disavowed an effort to impeach his deputy despite her apparent threat to have him killed.】
